EmailTemplate.description: Used to alert owner of a Support Team Request Churn Alert Case assigned to them
EmailTemplate.name: Churn Alert Case
EmailTemplate.subject: ***Churn Alert Case - Needs Attention**** {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please follow the link below to change the ownership of this case to the CSA on the account, and send a notification email via Salesforce.
Support Churn Case
Thank you
